document.full_text: saif al-adel, an egyptian militant recently appointed interim leader of al qaeda operations, has been linked to the killing of u.s. journalist daniel pearl in pakistan in 2002, u.s. investigators said in a report.
document.title: study ties new al qaeda chief to murder of journalist pearl
lines_and_colors: saif al-adel, an egyptian militant recently appointed interim leader of al qaeda operations, has been linked to the killing of u.s. journalist daniel pearl in pakistan in 2002, u.s. investigators said in a report.
